Class OldTempSensorAdapter

java.lang.Object
OldTempSensorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
itec3030.smarthome.standards.Controllable, itec3030.smarthome.standards.NumericMeasurementInstrument, itec3030.smarthome.standards.SmartThing, itec3030.smarthome.standards.TemperatureSensor
public class OldTempSensorAdapter extends Object implements itec3030.smarthome.standards.TemperatureSensor
This class converts temperature from old the old sensor (float) to int from temperature sensor in the get reading method. The other methods are adapting the oldtempsensor class to temperature sensor class.
